name: Rheum
description: Jump down the esophagus of a body plagued by viruses and big bad bosses in this reverse vertical scrolling shoot'em up! Collect eye crusties, upgrade your pupils, and clear the screen of bullets with your cornea crushing eye blasts!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP Processor: 1 GHz or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 64mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 140 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 10 Processor: 2 GHz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space
